titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the concurrent resolution (S. Con. Res. 70) setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2009 and including the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2008 and 2010 through 2013.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-630, by Mr. McGovern.

The rule adopts as an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text H. Con. Res. 312 as adopted by the House, adopts S. Con. Res. 70, as amended, and provides that the House insists on its amendment and requests a conference with the Senate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1190.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 187 (Roll no. 317).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 203 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/13/2008--Reported to House amended. Sets forth the rule for consideration of S.Con.Res. 70 (congressional budget).
